content: That's great advice, thanks! I'll definitely make sure to give my red pumps a good cleaning and conditioning before the gala. Speaking of comfort, I've been having issues with my old sneakers, which I wore to the gym on January 28th and again on February 4th. They're no longer comfortable to wear, and I think it's time to retire them. Do you have any recommendations for how to properly dispose of them or recycle them?
